intro: Build, stock, and dominate the Gaming Market!
description:
Step into the world of gaming retail and build your own game and console empire! In Game & Console Supermarket: Business Simulator, you’ll manage inventory, set prices, and create the ultimate shopping experience for gamers. Stock the latest consoles, best-selling games, and rare collectibles to attract customers and grow your business.

Expand your store, optimize sales, and outsmart competitors to become the ultimate gaming mogul. Will you dominate the industry or get left in the bargain bin? The choice is yours!
